com.smartitengineering.exim.impl.xml
Interface ElementExporter

All Known Implementing Classes:
AbstractElementExporter, GenericCollectionElementExporter, GenericDataTypeExporter, MapElementExporter, ResourceObjectExporter
public interface ElementExporter

An interface for different types of association exporter implementation. All its implementation should be designed in singleton thread safe way.

Since:
0.4
Author:
imyousuf

Method Detail

exportElement

void exportElement(AssociationConfig.AssociationType type,
                   java.lang.Object object,
                   javax.xml.transform.sax.TransformerHandler handler)
                   throws java.io.IOException
This operation is resposnsible for exporting XML elements of type it supports. It will use other type exporters for exporting and will only be responsible for the types it supports.

Parameters:
type - Type to export
object - Object to export
handler - Handler to use to create elements and attributes
Throws:
java.io.IOException - If any error while exporting

getSupportedTypes

java.util.Collection<AssociationConfig.AssociationType> getSupportedTypes()
